title: Politics, Roman style
itunes:title: Politics, Roman style
itunes:subtitle: Asa Bennett explores the lessons that 21st-century politicians could learn from their Roman forebears. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Classicist and political journalist Asa Bennett discusses his new book Romanifesto, which explores the lessons that 21st-century politicians could learn from their Roman forebears. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
